tuv.seg: Extra social welfare benefits
Sochair bhreise leasa shóisialaigh

If you are getting a social assistance payment or a social insurance payment from the Department of Social Protection you may be entitled to additional or extra benefits depending on your personal circumstances
Má tá tú ag fáil íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh nó íocaíocht árachais shóisialta ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí, b’fhéidir, ag brath ar do chúinsí pearsanta, go mbeifeá i dteideal sochair bhreise a fháil
In some cases, you can get a benefit even if you are not getting a social welfare payment
Chun sochar breise a fháil, ní mór duit na critéir cháilíochta a shásamh
For example, everyone over 66 is entitled to a Free Travel Pass
Mar shampla, le go bhfaighfeá an Méadú do Chónaí Aonair, ní mór duit íocaíocht áirithe leasa shóisialaigh a fháil agus bheith i do chónaí i d’aonar
To get an extra benefit you must satisfy the qualifying criteria
I roinnt cásanna, gheobhaidh tú sochar breise go huathoibríoch
For example, to get the Living Alone Increase you must be getting a certain social welfare payment and be living alone
Mar shampla, má fhaigheann tú Pinsean Míchumais, gheobhaidh tú Pas Taistil Saor in Aisce
In some cases you automatically get an additional benefit. For example, if you get Invalidity Pension you automatically get a Free Travel Pass
Ní foláir duit iarratas ar leith a dhéanamh le haghaidh gach sochair, áfach, chun go bhfaighfeá formhór na sochar breise
You may be entitled to the following additional social welfare benefits:
Má tá íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil agat, b’fhéidir go mbeifeá i dteideal na sochair bhreise leasa shóisialaigh seo a leanas a fháil:
Fuel Allowance is an allowance that provides help with the cost of fuel to people who are dependant on long-term social welfare payments
Méadú do Chónaí Aonair. Is íocaíocht fhorlíontach í do dhaoine atá ag fáil íocaíochtaí áirithe leasa shóisialaigh agus atá ina gcónaí ina n-aonar
Household Benefits Package is a package of benefits that provides financial assistance with the cost of some household utilities
Pacáiste Sochar Teaghlaigh Seo pacáiste sochar a thugann cúnamh airgid maidir le costas fóntais áirithe teaghlaigh
It includes an Electricity or Gas Allowance and a Free Television Licence
Áirítear ann Liúntas Leictreachais nó Gáis agus Ceadúnas Teilifíse Saor in Aisce

Supplementary Welfare Allowance Scheme consists of a basic payment, called Supplementary Welfare Allowance, and other financial supplements for certain expenses you may not be able to meet, including emergency situations
Pas Taistil Saor in Aisce Ceadaíonn sé seo do dhaoine atá ag fáil íocaíochtaí áirithe leasa shóisialaigh seirbhísí iompair phoiblí a rochtain saor in aisce
These include Rent Supplement, Back to School Clothing and Footwear Allowance, and Heating Supplements
Má tá tú i do chónaí ar oileán sonrach amach ó chósta na hÉireann, tig leat seirbhísí príobháideacha iompair áirithe a rochtain

Free Travel Pass allows people on certain social welfare payments to access public transport services for free. If you live on a specified island off the Irish coast you can access certain private transport services
Liúntas Breosla Is liúntas é seo a thugann cabhair maidir le costas breosla do dhaoine atá ag brath ar íocaíochtaí fadtréimhseacha leasa shóisialaigh
Living Alone Increase is a supplementary payment for people getting certain social welfare payments who are living alone
Méadú Oileáin Is íocaíocht fhorlíontach í seo le haghaidh daoine atá ag fáil íocaíochtaí áirithe leasa shóisialaigh agus atá ina gcónaí ar oileáin shonracha amach ó chósta na hÉireann
Island Increase is a supplementary payment for people getting certain social welfare payments and living on specified islands off the coast of Ireland
Ina measc seo tá Fordheontas ar Cíosa, Liúntas Éadaí & Coisbhirt don Scoilbhliain Nua, Fordheontas Aiste Bia agus Fordheontas Teasa
